posts.post_content:
@ TDL:  
  
As long as we're playing with Ravnica cards, why not kick it up a notch? If you're in Legacy or Modern, at least run Shocklands. And, 9 out of the 10 available fetchlands fetch Zoo shocklands.  
  
Turn 1: [Wooded Foothills](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wooded Foothills), [Arid Mesa](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arid Mesa), or [Windswept Heath](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Windswept Heath) into [Sacred Foundry](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sacred Foundry) or [Stomping Ground](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stomping Ground), cast [Goblin Guide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Guide).  
Turn 2: Repeat of Turn 1's shenanigans into [Watchwolf](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Watchwolf) or [Qasali Pridemage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Qasali Pridemage).  
Turn 3: Repeat of land shenanigans, [Wild Nacatl](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wild Nacatl), [Kird Ape](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kird Ape), or [Loam Lion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Loam Lion) plus kicked [Goblin Bushwhacker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Bushwhacker). Your opponent may now concede.
posts.html:
@ TDL:

As long as we're playing with Ravnica cards, why not kick it up a notch? If you're in Legacy or Modern, at least run Shocklands. And, 9 out of the 10 available fetchlands fetch Zoo shocklands.

Turn 1: Wooded Foothills, Arid Mesa, or Windswept Heath into Sacred Foundry or Stomping Ground, cast Goblin Guide.
Turn 2: Repeat of Turn 1's shenanigans into Watchwolf or Qasali Pridemage.
Turn 3: Repeat of land shenanigans, Wild Nacatl, Kird Ape, or Loam Lion plus kicked Goblin Bushwhacker. Your opponent may now concede.
